job.title: Software Engineer (Returnship) - Opportunity for Working Remotely
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongThe emPath Forward Return to Work emprogram at VMware is an 18week paid returnship for experienced professionals returning to the workforce after taking time off for caregiving The program is open to individuals who have at least 5 years of professional experience and have been out of the paid workforce for at least 2 years to focus on caring for a child or other dependent If you meet these criteria we welcome you to apply Applicants are not limited to the locations listed Candidates may apply from anywhere within the USbrbrstrongWhy would you find this new opportunity excitingbrbrstrongUhana by VMware empowers mobile operators with subscriberlevel radio access network RAN analytics giving them better control of their 4G amp 5G networks and maximizing the quality of service they can offer their customers Uhana correlates and enriches high volumes of streaming data from mobile network elements in realtime to provide unprecedented visibility Using artificial intelligence Uhana automatically determines the root cause of network issues and recommends remediationbrbrWe are looking for talented software engineers to join the Uhana Platform team now part of the Service Provider amp Edge business unit at VMware In this role you will be collaborating with excellent engineers responsible on the overall architecture and scalability of the software system in addition to handson implementation workbrbrstrongWhat will be your responsibilitiesbrbrstrongIn this role you will have the ability to contribute to the design and development of the Uhana platformbrulliWork with large volumes of data  design scalable software solutions for data ingestion parsing and processingliliDevelop cloudbased distributed software solutionsliliHelp develop efficient solutions for storing and consuming large volumes of dataliliCollaborate with data scientists to understand requirements and build an efficient stream processing system that enables advanced AI based analyticsbrliulThe team is composed of dedicated bright talented technologists who manage our global compute infrastructure architect the realtime dataprocessing software and build the distributed software platform to power the nextgeneration of mobile technologybrbrstrongWhat are we looking forbrbrstrongWe are looking for a highlymotivated individual who is willing to take up technical challenges work collaboratively in a team and can learnandgrow fastbrulli2 years of experience in software architecture design and development liliInterest in all things distributed in Cloud Distributed Systems Big Data RealTime StreamingProcessing experience liliExperience with either Java or GolangliliStrong problem solving and debugging skills liliHighly motivated team player liliGood communication and presentation skills brliulstrongNice to HavebrstrongulliExperience writing Java applications in a stream processing framework such as Kafka FlinkliliExperience working with cloudnative software frameworks like KubernetesliliExposure to dataML engineeringbrliulstrongWhat are the performance goals during the 18 week returnship you will work towards completingbrbrstrongSuccess in the role is defined by the ability to consistently create high quality code that addresses the business requirement and is well tested performant and maintainablebrulliYou will develop a solid understanding of the platform and functionality it supports in the context of the larger platform This would be demonstrated by your ability to deliver features and fix bugs proficiency handling production escalations and being the established service owner for one or two key servicesliliYou are actively participating in engineering design and development efforts ensuring that the solution can be scaled horizontally and meets the product requirements and expectationsbrliulstrongVMware is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits
